scripts.loadtest:report: artillery run --output report.json artillery-load-test.yml --dotenv .env.artillery && artillery report report.json --output report.html && npx open-cli report.html
scripts.load:api:quick: artillery run tools/load-tests/artillery/scenarios/quick.yml --dotenv .env.artillery --output tools/load-tests/artillery/reports/quick.json && node tools/load-tests/artillery/helpers/generate-html-report.cjs tools/load-tests/artillery/reports/quick.json tools/load-tests/artillery/reports/quick.html && node tools/load-tests/artillery/helpers/show-report-info.cjs quick && node tools/load-tests/artillery/helpers/open-report.cjs quick
scripts.load:api:50: NOTES_COUNT=50 ASSETS_COUNT=20 artillery run tools/load-tests/artillery/scenarios/session-upload.yml --dotenv .env.artillery --output tools/load-tests/artillery/reports/load-50.json && node tools/load-tests/artillery/helpers/generate-html-report.cjs tools/load-tests/artillery/reports/load-50.json tools/load-tests/artillery/reports/load-50.html && node tools/load-tests/artillery/helpers/show-report-info.cjs load-50 && node tools/load-tests/artillery/helpers/open-report.cjs load-50
scripts.load:api:200: artillery run tools/load-tests/artillery/scenarios/load-200.yml --dotenv .env.artillery --output tools/load-tests/artillery/reports/load-200.json && node tools/load-tests/artillery/helpers/generate-html-report.cjs tools/load-tests/artillery/reports/load-200.json tools/load-tests/artillery/reports/load-200.html && node tools/load-tests/artillery/helpers/show-report-info.cjs load-200 && node tools/load-tests/artillery/helpers/open-report.cjs load-200
scripts.load:api:300:balanced: artillery run tools/load-tests/artillery/scenarios/load-300-balanced.yml --dotenv .env.artillery --output tools/load-tests/artillery/reports/load-300-balanced.json && node tools/load-tests/artillery/helpers/generate-html-report.cjs tools/load-tests/artillery/reports/load-300-balanced.json tools/load-tests/artillery/reports/load-300-balanced.html && node tools/load-tests/artillery/helpers/show-report-info.cjs load-300-balanced && node tools/load-tests/artillery/helpers/open-report.cjs load-300-balanced
scripts.load:api:400:large: artillery run tools/load-tests/artillery/scenarios/load-400-large.yml --dotenv .env.artillery --output tools/load-tests/artillery/reports/load-400-large.json && node tools/load-tests/artillery/helpers/generate-html-report.cjs tools/load-tests/artillery/reports/load-400-large.json tools/load-tests/artillery/reports/load-400-large.html && node tools/load-tests/artillery/helpers/show-report-info.cjs load-400-large && node tools/load-tests/artillery/helpers/open-report.cjs load-400-large
scripts.load:api:500: artillery run tools/load-tests/artillery/scenarios/load-500.yml --dotenv .env.artillery --output tools/load-tests/artillery/reports/load-500.json && node tools/load-tests/artillery/helpers/generate-html-report.cjs tools/load-tests/artillery/reports/load-500.json tools/load-tests/artillery/reports/load-500.html && node tools/load-tests/artillery/helpers/show-report-info.cjs load-500 && node tools/load-tests/artillery/helpers/open-report.cjs load-500
scripts.load:api:1000: artillery run tools/load-tests/artillery/scenarios/load-1000.yml --dotenv .env.artillery --output tools/load-tests/artillery/reports/load-1000.json && node tools/load-tests/artillery/helpers/generate-html-report.cjs tools/load-tests/artillery/reports/load-1000.json tools/load-tests/artillery/reports/load-1000.html && node tools/load-tests/artillery/helpers/show-report-info.cjs load-1000 && node tools/load-tests/artillery/helpers/open-report.cjs load-1000
